Today

Kaleva 2030 Hackathon

November 14, 2024 12:00 - November 16, 2024 16:00

Kaleva Media celebrates the 125th anniversary of the newspaper Kaleva by organizing a hackathon event for university and college students. Gather a team of 3-6 people, sign up and get ready to create something new. Winning team gets a grand prize of 5000€! Travel, accommodation and food are paid for. Enrollment through your own university.

THIS WEEK

Kickstart business idea competition finale

November 27, 2024 12:00 - November 27, 2024 18:00

Kickstart business idea competition brings together the students of Oamk, University of Oulu and OSAO. Come and watch the competition finale where the teams compete for cash prizes of 1500€, 1000€ and 500€ by pitching their business idea!
